OOC: Everything looks fine to me Preston.  Being a large truck, Tucson is f=
ar too heavy to go too fast in such a short length of time, so 0 to 60 soun=
ds just about right.  

BIC:

Tucson didn't care about surface or internal =
damage at this time, he was far more concerned about keeping his comrades s=
afe from harm.  Quickstride quickly goes top side to see if Talon needs ass=
istance as Straight Shot quickly attends to Perceptor.  Both of which find =
themselves attempting to ward off the enemy with either arrow or high power=
ed gun fire.  The insects atop Tucson were posing a major threat to Legacy =
and Talon, as Quickstride tries desperately to back them up, shooting repea=
tedly to attempt to get the enemy off Tucson's trailer before they did any =
harm to his comrades.

"Woahh, a little more pest control than I bargained =
for! Legacy, Talon, you two okay?!"

Straight Shot too, finds herself firin=
g off arrows just to try and slow the insect beings down, while she despera=
tely tries to help Perceptor.

" That does it!  I wish these ugly bugs woul=
d turn around and get themselves caught in a spider web!  Hang in there Per=
ceptor, I got your back!"  

Tucson was becomming more and more annoyed by =
the insects.  Something had to be done before they destroyed his comrades. =
 He felt it was HIS responsibility to see to the welfare of his fellow Auto=
bots and Maximals.  He was the one in charge of their well being.  He hoped=
 by attempting a Sonar blast attack, he could immoblize the bug brigade.  I=
t would be a bold move on his part, and this he knew would hurt Perceptor i=
mmensely, since he was a predacon.

"Perceptor, I need you to turn off your=
 audio sensors for a short time.  I'm going to attempt a sonar blast which =
I hope will slow things down for us enough to get to Rodimus.  That way I k=
now I will not harm you when I do emit this attack. Straight Shot, when I'm=
 through doing that, tap him on the shoulder to let him know it's safe to t=
urn them back on."

She nodds. 

"Roger that Tucson Prime.  Okay Perceptor,=
 to be on the safe side, it's best if you shut down your audio sensors now.=
  I'll tap you on the shoulder when we're all finished."
